source_sentence: 佛說大集會正法經卷第二
translation: Foshuo dajihui zhengfa jing, vol. 2

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試鴻臚
translation: Xitian Translation of the Sutra of the Tripiṭaka, the Chaofeng Dafu tried Honglun

source_sentence: 卿傳法大師臣施護奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by imperial order from the minister Shi Hao, the great teacher who transmitted the Dharma to you

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊化諸尼乾陀眾已，即以方便善巧善說法，心住三摩呬多，舒金色臂經七晝夜，乃至普勇菩薩遊十方世界廣作佛事已，來還此土。
translation: After transforming the multitude of Nirgrantha, the Bhagavān then skillfully and skillfully taught the Dharma with skillful means, abiding mentally in samākhyata and extending his golden arm for seven days and nights, until the Pūrṇa had traveled to the worlds in ten directions and performed extensive Buddha-works and returned to this land.

source_sentence: 是時，普勇菩薩從彼蓮華上佛剎，譬如力士屈伸臂頃，到於佛前，禮佛足已，右繞三匝，住立一面。
translation: At the time, Pūrṇa went up from that lotus flower buddha's temple like a strong man who flexes and extends his arm, goes before the Buddha, salutes his feet, circles him three times to his right, and stands to one side.

source_sentence: 是時，世尊出三摩呬多已，普勇菩薩前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After the Bhagavān had produced the samākara, Pūrṇa went up to the Buddha and said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我承佛旨往彼十方世界，以自神通力，過九十九千俱胝佛剎，以佛神通力，又過百千俱胝佛剎，乃至最後到下方蓮華上世界。
translation: Following the Buddha's order, I went to those worlds in the ten directions and, with my own supernormal powers, passed 99,000 coffin buddhas, and, with the Buddha's supernormal powers, passed another hundred thousand coffin buddhas, ending up in the upper lotus world below.

source_sentence: 其中過八千俱胝佛剎，見彼諸佛現大神通；又過九十二千俱胝佛剎，見諸如來現為眾生說深妙法。
translation: There, he passed 8,000 coffin buddhas and saw the buddhas display great supernormal powers, and he passed 92,000 coffin buddhas and saw the tathāgatas presently teaching profound and subtle dharmas to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 又過八十千俱胝佛剎，於一時中，見八十千俱胝如來、應供、正等正覺出現於世，我時於彼一一佛前恭敬供養。
translation: There were also more than 80,000 coffin buddha bases where, at one time, I saw 80,000 coffin tathāgatas, worshipful, and perfectly enlightened ones appear in the world, and I was respectfully making offerings to each of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 又過三十九俱胝佛剎，見三十九千俱胝菩薩摩訶薩同時出現，皆證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，我即於彼初成道者，如是等如來、應供、正等正覺所，一一恭敬禮拜供養已，即復以自神通力隱身不現。
translation: After seeing 39,000 coarse buddha bases and 39,000 bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and buddhas appear simultaneously, all realizing supreme perfect enlightenment, I then venerated and made offerings to each of these first-attained practitioners, thus tathāgatas, worshipful offerings, and correct enlightenment, and then used my own supernormal powers to hide myself from view.

source_sentence: 又過六十俱胝佛剎，見諸如來一一恭敬。
translation: After another 60 coffin buddha bases, he sees the tathāgatas and venerates each one of them.

source_sentence: 又過百俱胝佛剎，見彼諸佛入般涅槃，我時還復一一於彼恭敬供養。
translation: After I passed through another hundred coffin buddha bases and saw those buddhas enter parinirvāṇa, I would again venerate and make offerings to each of them.

source_sentence: 從是復過九十五佛剎，知彼如來皆久滅度，所有正法將欲滅壞。
translation: From there, I passed through 95 more buddha bases and knew that those tathāgatas had all long since ceased and that the right Dharma was about to perish.

source_sentence: 我於是時竊自思惟：『此佛正法將欲滅壞、深為大苦。』
translation: At the time, I secretly thought to myself, 'This Buddha's right teaching is about to perish and is profoundly painful.'

source_sentence: 作是念已，生大悲愍。
translation: After that thought, I became very compassionate.

source_sentence: 是時復有欲色界天人、龍神、夜叉等皆大憂惱。
translation: At the same time, there were gods, humans, dragons, gods, and yakṣas in the desire realm who were greatly distressed.

source_sentence: 又見其中有一佛剎，彼佛正法久已滅盡，劫火熾然從四面起，乃至大地、須彌山王、大海、江河、一切樹木，皆悉已焚，無所依止，唯一空界，蕩然無際。
translation: They also saw a buddha whose true teaching had long since ended, and an eon of fire blazing up from all four sides, up to the earth, Sumeru the king of mountains, the ocean, rivers, and all the trees, which had all been burned up and had no support, and the only realm that was empty was vast and endless.

source_sentence: 「過是剎已即到下方，於一世界，見百千俱胝如來各坐寶蓮華座，又見四方亦復如是，彼等諸佛各各現為一切眾生說法化度。
translation: "After passing through this moment, he went below and saw a hundred thousand tathāgatas each sitting on a jeweled lotus seat in one world, and he saw the same in the four directions as well, each of those buddhas presently teaching the Dharma for all sentient beings and teaching them to save them.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我既到彼佛剎已，即作是念：『今此佛剎名字何等？』
translation: Once I arrived at that buddha bha, I thought, 'What's the name of this buddha bha?'

source_sentence: 彼有一佛而告我言：『善男子！
translation: There was a Buddha who said to me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 今此佛剎名蓮華上。』
translation: Now, this Buddha's blaze is called 'Padmasaṃbhava.'

source_sentence: 我時即問：『化主世尊，其名若何？』
translation: I then asked, 'Bhagavān, what's its name?'

source_sentence: 彼佛答言：『名蓮華藏如來、應供、正等正覺。』
translation: The Buddha answered, 'It's called the lotus treasury of tathāgatas, worshipful offerings, and correct and perfectly enlightened.'

source_sentence: 我於爾時，普皆作禮，一心恭敬，作是白言：『我今見此百千俱胝那庾多佛，一一皆處寶蓮華座，而復不知何者即名蓮華藏佛，唯願示我化主世尊。』
translation: At the time, we all paid homage, unified our minds in respect, and said, 'Now, I see these hundreds of thousands of koṭīnayutas, each one on a jeweled lotus seat, and I don't know which one of them is called the Lotus-Store Buddha, so please show me the World Honored One who is the master of transformation.'

source_sentence: 時，彼蓮華藏如來於多佛中發是告言：『善男子！
translation: Thereupon, the Lotus-Store Tathāgata addressed the many buddhas and said, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 蓮華藏佛即我身是。』
translation: The lotus-treasury Buddha is myself.'

source_sentence: 作是言已，彼諸佛等而各忽然隱如來身、現菩薩相。
translation: After saying this, the buddhas suddenly each hid the Tathāgata's body and appeared as bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 我當是時唯見化主蓮華藏如來，一佛世尊居大眾中，相好威神，無能勝者。
translation: I then saw only the Padmasaṃbhava Tathāgata, the lord of the transformation, a single Buddha, standing among the masses, with an appearance so dignified and imposing that there was no one who could surpass him.

source_sentence: 即以頭面，作禮恭敬。
translation: I then bowed my head to him and paid homage to him.

source_sentence: 是時，彼佛指蓮華座而謂我言：『善男子！
translation: Then, that Buddha pointed to the lotus seat and said to me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 可就此座。』
translation: You may sit on this seat.'

source_sentence: 「我於爾時既就座已，即見彼佛，於其左右復有無量寶蓮華座，殊妙莊嚴甚為希有，忽作是念：『如是等座云何皆空無能登者？』
translation: "After I had taken my seat, I saw that Buddha, and to his left and right there were measureless lotus seats of marvelous adornment that were quite rare, and suddenly I thought, 'Why are all these seats empty and there's no one who can ascend them?'

source_sentence: 乃問彼佛。
translation: Then he asked that Buddha.

source_sentence: 而答我言：『善男子！
translation: He answered me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 如此等座，皆是不可思議上妙功德之所建立，非少善根所能成就，若人於佛法分有未入者，尚不能見，況復能登？』
translation: Such seats are built of unfathomably high and marvelous qualities that cannot be achieved with few good roots; if a person has not yet entered the Buddha's portion of the teaching, they still cannot see it, so how could they ascend?'

source_sentence: 我時又問世尊：『當種何善根，於此等座而乃得昇？』
translation: I then asked the Bhagavān, 'What good roots will be planted so that I can ascend from these seats?'

source_sentence: 彼佛答言：『善男子！
translation: The Buddha replied, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有人能於此大集會正法暫聽受者，以是善根得昇此座，何況更能書寫、讀誦、常所修習。
translation: If someone can hear and accept this great assembly of the right teaching for a moment, then they'll be able to ascend to this seat because of their good roots, not to mention being able to write, recite, and always practice it.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝於過去無量劫來，已能受持如是大集會正法，若不以是善根力故，我此佛剎亦未能到，況復得見此座而欲昇耶？』
translation: If you hadn't been able to maintain this great assembly of the true teaching for countless eons, how could you have seen this seat and wanted to ascend it if I hadn't been able to reach this Buddha's buddha because of the strength of these good roots?'

source_sentence: 彼佛作是言已，我即白言：『如是如是！
translation: After the Buddha said this, I said, 'So it is, so it is!'

source_sentence: 世尊。』
translation: Bhagavān.'

source_sentence: 我復又問彼佛：『此大集會正法有幾所功德，而能生諸善法？』
translation: Again, I asked the Buddha, 'How much merit does this great assembly of the right teaching have that produces good qualities?'

source_sentence: 「爾時，彼蓮華藏如來，亦放希有淨妙光明，普照佛會已而謂我言：『善男子！
translation: "At the time, that same lotus-treasury Tathāgata also radiated a rare, pure, and marvelous light that universally illuminated the Buddha's assembly and said to me, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝大菩薩得大勢力智慧無礙，能於一切諸佛剎土，為諸眾生稱揚佛事，汝先已曾問彼娑婆世界釋迦如來，今以是法還復問我，我當為汝亦分別說，譬如有人於四大洲置以胡麻悉皆充滿，如是相合都為一聚，是為多不？』
translation: You great bodhisattvas have attained great power, unimpeded wisdom, and are able to praise the Buddha's works for sentient beings in all the buddha-lands. You've already asked the Śākyamuni Tathāgata of the Saha world about this teaching, and now you've asked me again about it.

source_sentence: 我即答言：『甚多。
translation: I then replied, 'Very much so.

source_sentence: 世尊！』
translation: Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 時彼佛言：『假使有人，取一胡麻置於他處，如是從一至一欲知其數。
translation: The Buddha then said, 'Suppose someone were to take a piece of flax and put it somewhere else, and they want to know its number from one to one like this.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於汝意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 是人可能知其數不？』
translation: Is it possible for a person to know its number?'

source_sentence: 我復答言：『不也。
translation: Again, I replied, 'No.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是人雖竭其力經於多劫，終不能知如是數量。』
translation: Even though this person has exhausted their powers for many eons, they still wouldn't be able to know such a quantity.'

source_sentence: 彼佛又言：『善男子！
translation: The Buddha then said, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 此大集會正法，所有福聚亦復如是，非算數譬喻之所能知，正使如上所說數量，一一皆是諸佛如來，復經俱胝那庾多劫稱量讚歎此大正法，聽受功德亦不能盡，何況有人書寫讀誦，其福甚多。』
translation: This great assembly of the right teaching is likewise full of merits that can't be calculated or described metaphorically; just as the above-mentioned number makes clear, each one of them is a tathāgata, a Buddha, or a Kārtti-nayut kalpa, who praises this great right teaching in detail, and the merits of listening and accepting it can't be exhausted, let alone the great merits of someone who writes and recites it.'

source_sentence: 「我復又問：『若書寫者得幾所福？
translation: "Again, I asked, 'How much merit does a person who writes receive?'

source_sentence: 願佛略說。』
translation: May the Buddha explain it in brief.'

source_sentence: 時，彼佛言：『善男子！
translation: Then, the Buddha said, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 譬如三千大千世界所有草木叢林，盡取斷為一指節量，一一量數皆是轉輪聖王；又如三千大千世界，所有土石盡碎微塵，一一塵數皆是轉輪聖王，如是等所有福聚，若算師等欲知其數，汝謂是人知其數不？』
translation: It's like the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds in which all the grass and trees and groves are cut down to the amount of a knuckle, and every one of those amounts is a wheel-turning sage king; it's also like the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds in which all the dirt and rocks are pulverized into tiny pieces, and every one of those amounts of dust is a wheel-turning sage king; if calculators and so forth want to know the amount of merit, do you think this person knows the amount of merit?'

source_sentence: 我時答言：『不也。
translation: I then replied, 'No.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是福聚，雖算師等亦不能知。』
translation: Such a stock of merit, even though it's not knowable by calculators and so forth, can't be known.'

source_sentence: 彼佛又言：『若有書寫此大集會正法者，所獲福聚亦復如是，復多於彼，算數譬喻所不能知。
translation: The Buddha also said, 'Suppose someone writes this right teaching of the great assembly, and the amount of merit they receive is likewise and more than that, which cannot be known by calculation or metaphor.

source_sentence: 但能於此正法書寫一字，是人所獲福聚已勝於彼；況復有人，於此正法受持一四句偈，是人功德不可稱計，一切寶藏常所出現，一切煩惱皆得銷滅，一切法炬光明普照，一切天魔無能勝者，一切菩薩盡所觀察一切法門皆悉能入。』
translation: If someone can write a single word of this right teaching, that person's accumulation of merit is already greater than theirs; how much more so if someone were to accept and uphold a single four-line verse of this right teaching, that person's virtues would be incalculable, all treasures would always appear, all afflictions would be extinguished, all the torches of the Dharma would shine universally, all the demons of heaven would be invincible, and all the bodhisattvas would be able to enter all the approaches to the Dharma that they completely observe.'

source_sentence: 彼佛作是說已，我即白言：『世尊！
translation: After the Buddha said this, I said, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生，能於如是大集會正法修正行者，乃得名為最上梵行，而彼梵行即如來行，若勤修習無間斷者，是人即得百佛如來於晝夜中常現在前，若見如來即入佛剎，入佛剎已，一切法藏皆能了知。』
translation: If there are sentient beings who can practice correctly in this great assembly of the true teaching, then they'll be called the supreme religious practice, and that religious practice is the practice of the Tathāgata; if they diligently cultivate it without interruption, that person will attain the presence of a hundred Tathāgatas who are always present during the day and night, and if they see the Tathāgata, they'll enter the Buddha's buddha-base; after entering the Buddha's buddha-base, they'll be able to comprehend the entire store of the Dharma.'

source_sentence: 「我於爾時作是言已，彼蓮華藏佛又告我言：『善男子！
translation: "After I said this, the Padmasaṃbhava again addressed me, saying, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 諸佛如來時一出現，若得遇者，是亦為難，說此正法，復甚為難，得聞持者，轉復甚難。
translation: It's also difficult to meet the Tathāgatas once they appear, and it's even more difficult to explain the right teaching, and it's even more difficult for someone to hear and retain it.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 若有聞此正法者，是人於六十萬六千八十劫中，或得宿命智，或為轉輪王、帝釋、淨光天、大梵世主等，能不壞正信，不墮諸惡趣，不生阿修羅，無刀杖鬪諍，又復遠離愚癡得大智慧，相好端嚴，猶如諸佛，一一色相等無有異，不為眷屬癡惱所纏，常離病苦，常得天眼，不為那誐，不生瞋恚，又常遠離一切貧窶，為銅輪王受大快樂，諸根圓滿忍辱具足，乃至臨命終時，正念現前心不顛倒。
translation: 若有聞此正法者，是人於六十萬六千八十劫中，或得宿命智，或為轉輪王、帝釋、淨光天、大梵世主等，能不壞正信，不墮諸惡趣，不生阿修羅，無刀杖鬪諍，又復遠離愚癡得大智慧，相好端嚴，猶如諸佛，一一色相等無有異，不為眷屬癡惱所纏，常離病苦，常得天眼，不為那誐，不生瞋恚，又常遠離一切貧窶，為銅輪王受大快樂，諸根圓滿忍辱具足，乃至臨命終時，正念現前心不顛倒。

source_sentence: 即時，東方有十二殑伽沙數佛面現其前，南方有二十殑伽沙數佛，西方有二十五殑伽沙數佛，北方有八十殑伽沙數佛，上方有九十千俱胝佛，下方有百俱胝佛，如是等諸佛皆為現前，安慰其人，咸作是言：「汝善男子！
translation: At that moment, twelve sands buddhas appear before him in the east, twenty sands buddhas in the south, twenty-five sands buddhas in the west, eighty sands buddhas in the north, ninety thousand corpuscles above, and one hundred corpuscles below, and all of these buddhas appear before him and comfort him, saying, "You good sons!

source_sentence: 勿生怖畏，汝先已能有大功德而為依怙，汝今見此百千俱胝那庾多殑伽沙數佛世尊不？」
translation: Don't be afraid, since you were able to rely on great merit, do you now see this world-honored one hundred thousand koṭīs of nayuta sands buddhas?"

source_sentence: 彼答言：「見。」
translation: They replied, "I see."

source_sentence: 時諸佛言：「善男子！
translation: The buddhas then said, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 此諸如來，以汝功德力故，俱來至此。」
translation: These tathāgatas, by virtue of your merits, have all come here."

source_sentence: 彼人復言：「我今以何善根力故，而獲如是？」
translation: That person then said, "By what power of good roots have I attained this?"

source_sentence: 彼諸佛言：「以汝久聞大集會正法大善根力。」
translation: The buddhas said, "Because you've heard the right teaching of the great assembly for so long, you have great wholesome roots."

source_sentence: 彼人又言：「如我一人得聞正法，尚獲如是無量功德，何況能令盡有情界普得聞知。」』
translation: That person also said, "If I alone have heard the right teaching, I've still attained such measureless merit, so why wouldn't I be able to cause the whole realm of sentient beings to hear it?"

source_sentence: 「時，蓮華藏如來廣說彼臨命終人見諸佛已，又告我言：『善男子！
translation: "The Lotus Sutra Tathāgata then explained in detail how that person had seen the buddhas when he was about to die, and he told me, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 若人得聞此大正法一四句偈者，與彼供養十三殑伽沙數如來、應供、正等正覺所獲福聚等無有異。
translation: If a person hears one four-line verse of this great assembly of the right teaching, there's no difference between the merit gained from making offerings to 13 tathāgatas, worshipful offerings, and correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 又若有人得聞此大集會正法者，所有福聚，譬如遍滿三千大千世界悉置胡麻，是等麻量一一皆是轉輪聖王。
translation: If someone were to hear this great assembly of the right teaching, their accumulation of merit would be like the sesame hemp that fills 3,000 great thousand worlds, and each of those amounts of sesame would be a wheel-turning sage king.

source_sentence: 假使有人，以諸珍寶各行布施如是輪王，所獲福聚，不如唯施一須陀洹；若施一須陀洹，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量須陀洹；若施如是須陀洹，不如施一斯陀含；若施一斯陀含，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量斯陀含；若施如是斯陀含，不如施一阿那含；若施一阿那含，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量阿那含；若施如是阿那含，不如施一阿羅漢；若施一阿羅漢，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量阿羅漢；若施如是阿羅漢，不如施一緣覺；若施一緣覺，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量所有緣覺；若施如是緣覺，不如施一菩薩；若施一菩薩，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量所有菩薩；若施如是菩薩，不如於一如來發淨信心布施供養；若於一如來信心供養，不如於彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量一切如來信心供養；雖於如是一切如來信心供養，不如有人於此大集會正法暫得聞持，所獲福聚倍多於彼，何況更能書寫讀誦，如是功德不可稱計。』
translation: 假使有人，以諸珍寶各行布施如是輪王，所獲福聚，不如唯施一須陀洹；若施一須陀洹，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量須陀洹；若施如是須陀洹，不如施一斯陀含；若施一斯陀含，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量斯陀含；若施如是斯陀含，不如施一阿那含；若施一阿那含，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量阿那含；若施如是阿那含，不如施一阿羅漢；若施一阿羅漢，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量阿羅漢；若施如是阿羅漢，不如施一緣覺；若施一緣覺，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量所有緣覺；若施如是緣覺，不如施一菩薩；若施一菩薩，不如施彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量所有菩薩；若施如是菩薩，不如於一如來發淨信心布施供養；若於一如來信心供養，不如於彼遍滿三千大千世界如前數量一切如來信心供養；雖於如是一切如來信心供養，不如有人於此大集會正法暫得聞持，所獲福聚倍多於彼，何況更能書寫讀誦，如是功德不可稱計。』

source_sentence: 「是時，彼佛又告我言：『善男子！
translation: "At the time, that Buddha also told me, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝可於此正法，發淨信心，宣揚流布。
translation: You may give rise to pure faith in this right teaching, proclaiming and disseminating it.

source_sentence: 諸凡夫類於此正法，不能得聞，設有聞者生疑不信，如何能入此大法聚？
translation: Ordinary people can't hear this right teaching, and if they hear it, they become doubtful and don't believe it, so how can they enter this great Dharma assembly?

source_sentence: 譬如有人入於大海，而欲盡見其水邊際，汝謂是人而能見不？』
translation: It's like a person who enters the ocean and wants to see the limit of its water, but do you think that person can see it?'

source_sentence: 我即答言：『不也。
translation: I then replied, 'No.'

source_sentence: 世尊！』
translation: Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 『又如有人臨於大海，以手勺水欲盡枯涸。
translation: 'It's like a person facing the ocean who wants to dry up with a spoonful of water in their hand.

source_sentence: 汝謂是人而能成不？』
translation: Do you think this person could do it?'

source_sentence: 我復答言：『不也。
translation: Again, I replied, 'No.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是等愚人，雖於海水欲知邊際、欲盡枯涸，終不能就，徒自疲勞，深為大失。』
translation: Such foolish people, even though they want to know the limit of their desires and want to dry up the ocean, are never able to reach it, and they tire themselves out in vain, which is a profound great loss.'

source_sentence: 時彼佛言：『諸凡夫類亦復如是，於此正法不能聽受，於生死海妄生顛倒增長愚癡，深為太失。
translation: The Buddha then said, 'So are ordinary people who can't listen to or accept this right teaching, deludedly produce delusion in the ocean of birth-and-death, and grow foolish, which is a profound loss.

source_sentence: 是人雖經百千俱胝那庾多如來、應供、正等正覺出現於世，不種善根，不得見佛，不聞是法，不為諸佛之所護念。
translation: Even though this person has appeared in the world through one hundred thousand koṭīs of tathāgatas, worshipful offerings, and correct enlightenment, they haven't planted good roots, haven't been able to see the Buddha, haven't heard this teaching, and aren't guarded by the buddhas.

source_sentence: 若有智者，能於百千俱胝那庾多佛所發淨信心，見彼諸佛生大歡喜，乃從諸佛得聞是法，聞是法已，即如實知，不生輕謗，是人得大善利，即為諸佛共所護念。
translation: If there's a wise person who can give rise to pure faith in a hundred thousand koṭīnayuṭas and becomes very happy when they see those buddhas, then they can hear this teaching from those buddhas, and after hearing this teaching, they truly know it and don't despise it, which gives them great benefit and makes them jointly guarded by the buddhas.

source_sentence: 若人於此正法，能聽受書寫一四句偈者，是人當生過九十五千俱胝佛剎已，得生極樂世界見佛聞法，壽命八萬四千劫。』
translation: If a person can listen to and accept this right teaching and write down a four-line verse, that person will be born past 95,000 corpuscles of buddhas and will be born in the paradise world, where he'll see the Buddha and hear the teaching for 84,000 eons.'

source_sentence: 「彼蓮華藏佛復告我言：『若人於五逆罪，或自所作，或教他作，或見聞隨喜，是人當受五無間苦；若有得聞此大集會正法一四句偈，即得銷滅如是等業。』
translation: "The Lotus Sutra Buddha again told me, 'If a person commits the five heinous sins, either by doing it themselves, teaching others to do it, or seeing and hearing about it and rejoicing in it, that person will be subject to the five kinds of unremitting suffering; if they hear one four-sentence verse of the right teaching of this great assembly, they'll be able to extinguish such actions.'

source_sentence: 是時，彼佛即復為我宣說伽陀：「『汝今聽我說，　　聞此經功德，　　往劫有一人，　　具造五種業，　　謂殺父害母，　　破和合僧伽，　　毀菩薩三昧，　　壞如來正智。
translation: The Buddha then again spoke for me, explaining the kāṭa, 'Now, listen to me, for the merit of hearing this sūtra, there was a person in a past life who did five kinds of actions, namely, killing his father and harming his mother, destroying the harmony of the saṃgha, disrupting the bodhisattva's concentration, and destroying the Tathāgata's right knowledge.

source_sentence: 彼人作是罪，　　後即生追悔，　　憂惱復啼泣，　　心生如是念：　「我造眾惡業，　　非唯壞此身，　　後世及多劫，　　其身皆破壞。
translation: That person commits such an offense, then they repent, weep with grief, and think, "I've created so many bad actions, not just to destroy this body, but to destroy their bodies in later lives and many eons.

source_sentence: 從苦生於苦，　　苦受轉復深，　　遠離眾善友，　　為世所輕誚。
translation: From suffering comes suffering, the painful feelings become deeper, I'm separated from good friends, and I'm reviled by the world.

source_sentence: 世出世間法，　　我悉皆已焚，　　無量劫善因，　　破壞不增長。
translation: I've burned all the worldly and transmundane dharmas, and the good causes of countless eons have been destroyed and won't grow.

source_sentence: 如世間舍宇，　　眾彩所莊嚴，　　而忽為火焚，　　人皆絕愛樂。
translation: Like a worldly house, decorated with multicolored decorations, which is suddenly consumed by fire, people are cut off from its pleasures.

source_sentence: 我作罪亦然，　　此世與他世，　　為業火所焚，　　自他非愛樂。
translation: I did the same thing, creating sins that were burned by the fires of karma in this and other worlds, and which were not enjoyed by myself or others.

source_sentence: 在在世所生，　　人譏罵捶打，　　常貧困飢渴，　　苦惱眾所侵。
translation: Born in this world, they're ridiculed, beaten, made poor, hungry, and thirsty, and are subject to numerous afflictions.

source_sentence: 如是等報應，　　非別因所感，　　皆從五業生，　　不善果無失。
translation: Such rewards, which are not caused by any other cause, are all produced from five actions, and the results of unwholesomeness are not lost.

source_sentence: 我今苦既然，　　誰為救護者？
translation: Now that I'm suffering, who will be my protector?

source_sentence: 親友力不能，　　一切無依止。」
translation: Because of the strength of my friends and relatives, I have no support."

source_sentence: 復作是思惟：　　「我不如今時，　　往彼高山頂，　　墜身終此命。
translation: Again, he thought, "I won't go to the top of that high mountain right now and fall down and end my life here.

source_sentence: 免增長惡業，　　轉生於苦惱，　　此世及他世，　　為惡業所壞。
translation: Lest I increase bad karma and be reborn in suffering and distress, I'd be damaged by bad karma in this and other lives.

source_sentence: 內既無依怙，　　身外亦復然，　　現為過失因，　　當受極惡報。」
translation: Since I have no internal support, I'll do the same outside my body, which will be the cause of my faults and bring extremely bad consequences."

source_sentence: 彼作是念已，　　而復自啼泣。
translation: After they think this, they again weep.

source_sentence: 即時虛空中，　　有天人告言：　「悲哉！
translation: At that moment, there were gods and humans in the sky who said, "Oh, pity!

source_sentence: 汝愚癡，　　心生諸苦惱，　　無歸復無救，　　汝自作五業，　　殺父害母等，　　苦惱今自受，　　何故作是思，　　欲高山殞命？
translation: You're foolish, your mind produces suffering and distress, has no refuge and no help, you created five actions yourself, killed your father, harmed your mother, and so forth, and now you're suffering and distressing yourself, so why do you think this, wanting to take a high mountain plunge into life?

source_sentence: 我今勸於汝，　　勿起愚癡見，　　但生悔過心，　　何須損身命！
translation: Now, I would advise you not to give rise to a foolish view but to repent, so that you don't have to harm yourself or your life!

source_sentence: 貪瞋癡三毒，　　從汝心所生，　　惡趣中苦惱，　　無由得免離。
translation: The three poisons of greed, anger, and delusion arise from your mind, and there's no way to escape the suffering and distress of a bad destiny.

source_sentence: 雖欲絕身命，　　不得名精進，　　此處命速盡，　　後惡報速生。
translation: Even though you want to end your life, you can't be called diligent, for here your life will quickly end, and the results of evil in the future will quickly arise.

source_sentence: 汝今聽我言，　　為汝設方便，　　佛菩薩聖道，　　汝未能趣向。
translation: Now, listen to me when I tell you to devise a way for you to follow the noble path of the buddhas and bodhisattvas, to which you're not yet headed.

source_sentence: 今可往一山，　　仙人修行處，　　汝當親敬禮，　　彼能為救護。
translation: Now, you can go to a mountain, a place where sages practice, where you'll pay close respect, and they'll be able to help you.

source_sentence: 有最勝方便，　　謂上妙正法，　　能離諸怖畏，　　銷除極惡業。」
translation: He has the most excellent skillful means, which is the most sublime right teaching, that parts with fears and removes extremely bad karma."

source_sentence: 彼人於是時，　　聞空中言已，　　即詣於山中，　　仙人修行處。
translation: After hearing those words in the air, that person went to a place in the mountains where an immortal was practicing.

source_sentence: 到已見一仙，　　即時頭面禮，　　合掌白是言：　　「願仙救護我，　　我怖畏苦惱，　　造極重五業，　　必墮於惡趣。
translation: When he arrived, he saw an immortal, bowed his head to his face, put his palms together, and said, "May the immortals guide me, for I'm afraid and afflicted, and I've created five extremely heavy karmas that will surely land me in a bad destiny.

source_sentence: 云何得免離？
translation: How can I be freed from them?

source_sentence: 我於晝夜中，　　飲食及坐臥，　　常憂生苦惱，　　暫時無少樂。
translation: During the day and night, when I eat and drink and sit and lay down, I'm constantly sad and distressed, and I experience no small amount of pleasure for a while.

source_sentence: 我今於仙人，　　生信心尊重，　　如我所問者，　　願仙為我說。
translation: Now, I have faith in and respect for sages, and I hope they'll tell me what I've asked.

source_sentence: 我造眾惡業，　　如何得銷滅？」
translation: How can I extinguish the many bad karmas I've created?"

source_sentence: 時彼仙答言：　　「汝問我當說。」
translation: That sage then answered, "I will explain your question."

source_sentence: 是時彼仙人，　　食已濯手足，　　即跏趺而坐，　　聽彼親自首。
translation: After he had eaten, that sage washed his hands and feet, sat cross-legged, and listened to his relative's head.

source_sentence: 彼人時右繞，　　禮仙而退坐，　　白言我愚癡，　　殺父及害母。
translation: That man then circled to his right, paid homage to the sage, and withdrew to sit, saying, "I've been foolish, killing my father and damaging my mother.

source_sentence: 破和合僧伽，　　毀菩薩三昧，　　壞如來正智，　　造此五種業。
translation: Destroying the harmony of the saṃgha, disparaging the bodhisattva's concentration, and destroying the Tathāgata's right knowledge have created these five kinds of actions.

source_sentence: 彼仙聞是說，　　即時而謂言：　「汝實不善人，　　作如此等罪。」
translation: When the sage heard this, he immediately said, "You're really not a good person for committing such crimes."

source_sentence: 彼人聞仙言，　　又復生憂惱，　　恐畏無所救，　　必當墮惡趣。
translation: When that person heard what the immortal said, he again became sad and troubled, fearing that there was nothing to save him and that he would surely fall into a bad destiny.

source_sentence: 是時從座起，　　禮彼仙人足，　　轉復生恭敬，　　作如是白言：　「仙人悲念我，　　極重惡業者，　　疑惑苦惱深，　　唯願作依怙。
translation: Then he got up from his seat, bowed his head at the sage's feet, paid respect to him, and said, "Sage, have compassion on me, for I'm a person with extremely heavy bad karma and deep doubts and afflictions who only wish to be a refuge.

source_sentence: 我雖如是悔，　　無出離方便，　　仙人大慈悲，　　令我罪銷滅。」
translation: Although I thus repent, I have no way to escape, but the sage has great compassion and makes my sins cease."

source_sentence: 仙聞是說已，　　安慰彼人言：　「汝今勿怖畏，　　我能為救護，　　一心開導汝，　　令汝離眾苦，　　得重罪銷滅，　　我即是所歸。
translation: After hearing this, the sage reassured that person, saying, "Don't be afraid now; I can rescue and guide you with one mind, free you from suffering, and extinguish your heavy sins; I am the one to whom you belong.

source_sentence: 佛有妙法門，　　名為大集會，　　是最上方便，　　汝昔曾聞不？」
translation: The Buddha has a wonderful teaching called the great assembly, which is the supreme method; have you ever heard it before?"

source_sentence: 彼人答仙言：　　「我昔未曾聞。」
translation: That person answered the sage, "I've never heard that before."

source_sentence: 仙人復告言：　　「哀哉罪業者，　　如人火已焚，　　誰當為說法？
translation: The sage then told him, "My condolences, sinful activity, like a person who's been burned by fire, who will speak for him?

source_sentence: 我今以悲心，　　示汝微妙法，　　汝今當善聽。
translation: Now, with compassion, I'll show you the subtle Dharma, and you will listen well.

source_sentence: 我念往昔時，　　過無量無邊，　　阿僧祇數劫。
translation: I think back to a time in the past, when there were measureless and limitless incalculable eons.

source_sentence: 時有一囉惹，　　無垢月為名，　　眷屬甚熾盛，　　以正法治世。
translation: There was a rāja, named Vimalakīrti, who had a very prosperous retinue and ruled the world correctly.

source_sentence: 囉惹於一時，　　而生育一子，　　即令召相師，　　觀彼善惡相。
translation: One time, that rāja gave birth to a son, and I summoned a master of signs to examine his good and bad features.

source_sentence: 乃問相師言：　　『今我此一子，　　為善為惡相，　　汝觀當云何？』
translation: He then asked the fortune teller, 'Now, what do you observe about this son of mine, whether he has good or bad features?'

source_sentence: 相師前白言：　　『怪哉此一子！
translation: The Xiangxiang master said, 'What a strange child!'

source_sentence: 如我所觀者，　　其相極不善！』
translation: As I have observed, their appearance is extremely unpleasant!'

source_sentence: 囉惹復謂言：　　『不善相云何？
translation: Rājagṛha replied, 'What are the unwholesome aspects?'

source_sentence: 如汝所觀相，　　諦實為我說。』
translation: 'As you have observed the marks, truly explain this for me.'

source_sentence: 相師作是白：　　『此子至七歲，　　當起癡害心，　　斷於父母命。』
translation: The fortune teller then said, 'When this child reaches the age of seven, he'll become deluded and harmful, and he'll cut off the lives of his parents.'

source_sentence: 囉惹復告言：　　『其相雖如是，　　寧棄我身命，　　此子終不壞，　　我若棄是者，　　當不復人趣。』
translation: Rājagṛha then told him, 'Even though his features are like this, I'd rather throw away my body and life; this son will never be destroyed, and if I throw him away, he'll no longer be able to go to human rebirth.'

source_sentence: 即令諸眷屬，　　善養育我子，　　其後彼童子，　　不久漸長大。
translation: He then had his retinue nurture my son, and soon afterward, that boy grew up.

source_sentence: 是時無垢月，　　憶彼相師言，　　即生如是念：　　『今我業恐至，　　有何所悋惜！』
translation: Then, remembering the words of his master, Vimalakīrti had this thought, 'Now, I'm afraid my karma will come to an end; what's there to be stingy about?'

source_sentence: 既作是念已，　　乃勅令童子，　　汝今繼我位。
translation: Having thought this, he then commanded the boy, 'Now, you will inherit my position.'

source_sentence: 復謂童子言：　　『汝今當諦聽，　　今我此境界，　　廣大復殊異，　　如日月照世，　　富貴而自在。
translation: Again, he said to the boy, 'Now, listen closely, for this is my objective realm, vast and different, like the sun and moon shining in the world, rich and powerful, and self-possessed.

source_sentence: 今我此提舍，　　悉當付於汝，　　我於此境中，　　不復為所有。』
translation: Now, I will give you all of this house of mine, and I won't have any more of it in this realm.'

source_sentence: 時諸臣僕等，　　忽聞是事已，　　來詣無垢月，　　咸作是白言：　『我尊今何故？
translation: When the ministers and servants who heard this suddenly came to the Vimalakīrti Moon, they all said, 'What's happened to our venerable friend?'

source_sentence: 棄捨於境界，　　其事知云何？
translation: "What do you know about abandoning the objective world?

source_sentence: 願尊為我說。』
translation: May Your Holiness explain this for me.'

source_sentence: 無垢月答言：　　『汝等今當知，　　付提舍與子，　　亦非無因緣。
translation: Vimalakīrti replied, 'You should now know that it wasn't for lack of a cause that Pūrṇa and his son were born.

source_sentence: 我念於往昔，　　囉惹名蓮華，　　境界甚廣大，　　自在而富貴。
translation: I remember a time in the past when Rājagṛha was called the lotus, and his realm was so vast that he was comfortable and wealthy.

source_sentence: 而彼於一時，　　亦生於一子，　　其年漸長大，　　即害其父母。
translation: At one point, however, he also gave birth to a son who grew older and harmed his parents.

source_sentence: 我今若不以，　　此提舍與子，　　當如彼蓮華，　　受無量苦惱。
translation: If I don't do this now, this Tiṣya and his son will be like that lotus flower and experience measureless suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 我常自思惟，　　不應生後悔，　　以是因緣故，　　我今當付彼。』」
translation: I've always thought to myself, 'I shouldn't regret this, and because of this cause, I will pay them now.'"

source_sentence: 是時彼仙人，　　為造五業者，　　說是因緣已，　　復告彼人言：　「汝今造五業，　　極重過於彼，　　我生悲愍心，　　為汝設方便。
translation: After he explained these causes and conditions for the person who had created the five actions, that sage then told that person, "Now, you've created five actions that are far more serious than that person's, and I've been kind and compassionate in setting up a way for you to do so.

source_sentence: 汝可詣佛所，　　聽大集會法，　　若得聽受者，　　罪業皆銷滅。
translation: You may go to the Buddha and listen to the teaching of the great assembly, and if you hear and accept it, your sins and actions will all cease.

source_sentence: 所有煩惱障，　　悉皆得無礙，　　以聞正法故，　　免墮於惡趣。
translation: All the afflictive hindrances are unimpeded, and because they hear the right teaching, they'll be spared falling into bad destinies.

source_sentence: 若人能一心，　　聽大集會法，　　一四句偈者，　　獲無量福聚。
translation: If someone can whole-heartedly listen to the teaching of the great assembly, one four-line verse at a time, they'll attain a measureless stock of merit.

source_sentence: 滅五逆重罪，　　得廣大果報，　　一切諸蓋纏，　　剎那能解脫。」
translation: He'll cease the five heinous sins and attain their vast rewards, and he'll be freed from all the hindrances in an instant."

source_sentence: 時彼造業人，　　聞仙所言已，　　即合掌恭敬，　　一心頭面禮。
translation: After hearing what the sage said, the person doing the deed put his palms together in respect and bowed with one heart, head, and face.

source_sentence: 作如是讚言：　　「善哉！
translation: He gave this praise, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善知識！
translation: good friend!

source_sentence: 能引示於我，　　大集會法門。」
translation: He'll show me the way to the great assembly of teachings."

source_sentence: 仙人說此已，　　時有萬二千，　　諸天子眾等，　　來詣仙人所，　　各恭敬合掌，　　頭面禮仙足。
translation: After the sage said this, 12,000 gods and sons of gods came to the sage, each respectfully joined their palms, and bowed their heads and feet to the sage.

source_sentence: 復有四俱胝，　　諸大龍王眾，　　亦來詣仙所，　　以頭面禮足。
translation: There were another four corpuscles of great dragon kings who also came to the sage's place and bowed their heads and feet to him.

source_sentence: 又有萬八千，　　俱胝夜叉王，　　來詣於仙所，　　亦頭面禮足。
translation: There were another 8,000 koṭī of the king of the yakṣas who came to the sage's place, and they also bowed their heads and feet.

source_sentence: 俱白如是言：　　「善哉大仙人，　　深了諸佛法，　　善開天界門，　　及滅億僧祇，　　三塗受苦趣。
translation: They all said, "Good, great sage, who deeply understands the Buddha's teachings, skillfully opens the gate to the heavenly realm, and extinguishes billions of incalculable eons and the three destinies of suffering.

source_sentence: 稱揚大集會，　　微妙最上法，　　有殊勝功德，　　能息諸重罪。
translation: He praises the great assembly as the most subtle and excellent teaching, which has extraordinary qualities and calms serious sins.

source_sentence: 若人於一偈，　　隨喜而聽受，　　乃可得名為，　　深種善根者。
translation: If a person heeds a verse with joy and accepts it, then they can be called someone who has deeply planted good roots.

source_sentence: 何況更一心，　　生尊重恭敬，　　以華鬘塗香，　　栴檀末香等，　　珍寶蓋幢幡，　　供養此正法，　　自作及勸他，　　見聞生隨喜，　　所獲諸福報，　　廣大無有窮。
translation: How much more so when they are unified in mind, give rise to respect and veneration, offer up this right teaching with flowers, incense, sandalwood, powdered incense, and other treasures, coverings, banners, and streamers, and make offerings to self and others, and then rejoice when they see and hear it, the merits they attain are vast and unfathomable.

source_sentence: 善哉汝仙人，　　真實具悲者。」
translation: Good for you, sage, truly compassionate one."

source_sentence: 天子龍王眾，　　及夜叉王等，　　作是稱讚已，　　禮仙而不現。』」
translation: After praising them, the gods, sons, dragon kings, and yakṣa kings paid homage to the sage but didn't show up."

source_sentence: 爾時，普勇菩薩於釋迦牟尼佛前，廣說蓮華藏如來稱讚大集會正法如是功德已，合掌恭敬前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After he had spoken extensively before Śākyamuni Buddha about the merits of praising the true teaching of the great assembly by the lotus treasury tathāgata, the Puṇyong Bodhisattva joined his palms in respect and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若復有人，於此正法但能合掌頂禮恭敬，所獲善利而復云何？」
translation: If another person simply joins their palms in salutation and respect for this right teaching, what good benefit does they obtain?"

source_sentence: 佛言普勇：「是人所獲福聚亦復無邊，譬如無熱惱池，龍王所居，而彼宮殿，日所不照，有五大河，池水流出，無有窮盡。
translation: The Buddha said to Pūrṇa, "This person's accumulation of merit is also limitless. It's like a pond without heat or distress where a dragon king lives and whose palace is not illuminated by the sun, and there are five large rivers whose water flows out without limit.

source_sentence: 假使有人，欲知池水一一滴數，汝謂是人而能知不？」
translation: Suppose someone wanted to know the number of each drop of water in a pond, do you think this person would be able to know it?"

source_sentence: 普勇白言：「不也。
translation: Puyong said, "No.

source_sentence: 世尊！」
translation: Bhagavān!"

source_sentence: 佛言：「此大集會正法，所有善根廣大無比，亦復如是。
translation: The Buddha said, "So it is with this great assembly of the right teaching, which has good roots that are vast and incomparable.

source_sentence: 假使有人欲知此法功德限量，縱經千劫終不能盡。
translation: If someone wanted to know the limit of the merit of this teaching, it would take a thousand eons, but they wouldn't be able to exhaust it.

source_sentence: 又復，普勇！
translation: Again, Pūrṇa!

source_sentence: 此法甚深，難解、難了，一切如來所共尊重，若復有人須臾聽受，即得如是廣大利益。」
translation: This teaching is so profound and difficult to understand and comprehend that it's respected by all tathāgatas, and if another person were to listen to it for a moment, they would attain such vast benefits."

source_sentence: 普勇菩薩復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Puyong Pusa then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼五大河其名何等？」
translation: What are the names of those five great rivers?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「五大河者，所謂：殑伽河、細多河、嚩芻河、閻牟那河、贊捺囉婆誐河。
translation: The Buddha said, "The five great rivers are the Ganges, the Sītā, the Vakṣu, the Yamunā, and the Zandravāga.

source_sentence: 此五大河，一一各有五百小河而共圍繞，其水流注入于大海。
translation: Each of these five great rivers is surrounded by 500 smaller rivers, each of which flows into the ocean.

source_sentence: 彼五大河一一河中，而復各有一大龍王，所謂：歡喜龍王、商珂龍王、嚩漢底龍王、唧怛囉西那龍王、法思惟龍王，如是等龍王，各與一千眷屬俱，於閻浮提時降甘雨，百穀苗稼皆悉滋茂，乃至山川、溪壑、林藪、泉池，花卉、菓蓏、枝葉、根莖，雨之所及，無不豐足。
translation: In each of those five great rivers, there's another great dragon king, called the joyful dragon king, the shankar dragon king, the vahandi dragon king, the kirtana dragon king, and the fathomless dragon king, and each of these dragons, along with a thousand of his retinues, sends sweet rain down from time to time in Jambudvīpa, which produces a hundred crops, even mountains, streams, valleys, forests, springs, and pools, and flowers, fruits, plants, branches, leaves, and roots that are abundant wherever the rain reaches them.

source_sentence: 普勇當知，若有眾生於此正法，起不善語業而生輕謗，彼所獲罪無量無邊。
translation: You should know, Pūrṇa, that if a sentient being does not speak well of this right teaching and misrepresents it, the offense they incur is incalculable and limitless.

source_sentence: 又復，若有眾生於此正法，發善語業而行讚歎，彼所獲福聚亦無量無邊，是人即能親近善友、得見如來，若得見佛，即能銷滅一切罪障。
translation: Furthermore, if sentient beings praise this right teaching with good words, the merits they obtain will be measureless and limitless, and that person will then be able to become close to good friends and see the Tathāgata, and if they were to see the Buddha, they would be able to eliminate all the hindrances of sins.

source_sentence: 普勇！
translation: Puyong!

source_sentence: 譬如四大洲中有鐵輪王為一洲主，威猛、自在、廣大、快樂，復能利益一切人民。
translation: It's like the four continents where there's an iron wheel king who's the lord of one continent, powerful, sovereign, vast, and happy, and who can also benefit all the people.

source_sentence: 今此大集會正法亦復如是，於閻浮提中，為諸眾生作大利益。
translation: This great assembly of the right teaching is likewise, and it creates great benefits for sentient beings in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 若不得聞此正法者，是人不能成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不能住菩提場、處師子座、轉大法輪、擊大法鼓，亦復不能入涅槃界、放大光明普照世間。」
translation: If someone doesn't hear this right teaching, they won't be able to achieve supreme, perfect enlightenment, abide in the site of enlightenment, sit on the lion's seat, turn the great wheel of the Dharma, beat the great drum of the Dharma, or enter the realm of nirvāṇa and shine a bright light that universally illuminates the world."

source_sentence: 普勇菩薩復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Puyong Pusa then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼蓮華上世界，蓮華藏如來所說仙人，而能令彼造五業者得滅重罪，我實不知居何等位，願佛慈悲當為開示。」
translation: I really don't know what rank that sage from the lotus-treasury world, the lotus-treasury tathāgata, can cause those people who create the five karmas to cease their heavy sins, so may the Buddha have compassion and show them."

source_sentence: 佛言普勇：「彼仙人者已得不退轉地，久已成就大集會正法。
translation: The Buddha said to Puyong, "That sage has already attained the stage of nonretrogression and has long since accomplished the right teaching of the great assembly.

source_sentence: 普勇當知，諸佛語言甚深微妙，若有聞此正法深生信受，是即見彼仙人，亦同見彼殑伽沙等諸佛如來殊妙色相，諸佛愛敬諸佛稱讚，常所安住諸佛三昧，而能通達如是大集會正法。」
translation: Puyong should know that the words of the buddhas are so profound and subtle that if he hears this right teaching and deeply believes it, then he'll see that sage, and he'll also see the sands of the buddhas with the Tathāgata's marvelous appearance, the buddhas' love and respect, the buddhas' praise, and the constant abiding in the samādhi of the buddhas, and he'll be able to comprehend the right teaching of the great assembly like this."

source_sentence: 佛說大集會正法經卷第二
translation: Foshuo dajihui shifa jing, vol. 2
